chapter.text: Loka kisa ciza bare pucha rahe hana
Usa vadi sucana bare
Jisa bare iha loka matabheda karade hana
Kade vi nahim, jaladi hi uha jana lainage
Kade vi nahim, jaladi hi uha jana lainage
Ki asim dharati nu pharasa nahim bana'i'a
Ate paharam nu mekham (sahara dena vale khabe)
Ate tuhanu asim' jore-jore bana'i'a
Ate ninda nu tuhadi thakana dura karana la'i bana'i'a
Ate rata nu parada bana'i'a
Ate asim dina nu rozi kama'una da samam bana'i'a
Ate asim tuhade upara sata pake asamana bana'e
Ate asim unham vica ika camakada ho'i'a diva rakha dita
Ate asim pani nala bhare badalam rahi' mohaledhara minha varasa'i'a
Tam ki asim usa de rahim anaja ate sabazi'am uga'i'e
Ate saghane baga
Besaka faisale de dina da samam nisacita hai
Jisa dina sura vica bigala vaja'i'a javega, phira tusim jhudam de jhuda avoge
Ate asamana khaul'ha dita javega, phira usa vica daravaze hi daravaze ho janage
Ate pahara cala dita janage uha reta varage ho janage
Besaka naraka ghata vica hai
Bagi'am da tikana
Usa vica uha lame samem taka pa'e rahinage
Usa vica na uha kise thadaka nu cakhanage ate na pina vali ziza nu
Paratu khaul'hada pani ate (jakhamam di) pika
Unham de karama anusara badala hai
Uha hisaba da dara nahim rakhade sana
Ate unham ne sadi'am a'itam nu sapurana jhuthala' dita
Ate asim hara ciza nu likha ke usa di ginati kara rakhi hai
Tam cakho. Asim tuhadi saza vadha'unde janvage
Besaka darana vali'am la'i safalata hai
Saga ate agura
ate barabara umara vali'am naujavana laraki'am
Ate bhare ho'e jama
Uthe uha mithi'a ate jhuthi'am galam nahim sunanage
Tere raba valom unham de karamam de anusara badala hovega
Rahimana valom jihara akasa ate dharati ate unham de vicakara di'am cizam da palanahara hai. Ko'i takata nahim rakhada ki usa nala gala kare
Jisa dina jibarila ate farisate kataram bana ke kharhe honage, (usa vele) ko'i nahim' bolega. Paratu (usa tom' binham? Jisa nu rahimana agi'a deve ate uha yoga gala kahega)
Iha dina nisacita hai, sau jihara cahe apane raba vala (apana) tikana bana lave
Asim tuhanu nere a jana vali saza tom dara dita hai. Jisa dina manukha usa nu dekha lavega, jihara usa de hatham ne age bheji'a hai tam avagi'akari akhega ki kasa! Maim siti huda
